journal-entries.text: We learned how to build HTML elements and insert them into are index.html file
We worked in a group project titled Hello World to dividing small tasks amongst each team member to build and complete a mock travel website.
We began to cover the fundamentals of functions in Javascript.
We began to cover the fundamentals of adding event listeners and manipulating the DOM with javascript.
We began to cover the fundamentals of using a json server to fetch data from and manipulating the DOM with fetched data utilizing javascript.
